ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 206
ygData.msgSnippet: The delay of a weapon is the tenths of a second taken to use it.  So a Mino Axe, delay 38, should strike every 3.8 seconds. If you want to verify these
ygData.messageBody:
The delay of a weapon is the tenths of a second taken to use it. So a Mino
Axe, delay 38, should strike every 3.8 seconds.

If you want to verify these numbers, time the amount of time needed for 10
strikes. Should be right around 38 secs for the mino axe.

Anthem is rumored to reduce the delay by 10%. So the mino axe will strike
every 3.42 seconds with Anthem.


Wayne



> From: "TommyC" <uber_sorcerer@...>
>Subject: Re: How to know if Anthem is really working
>
>I may be beating a dead horse,but.......I have been useing a mino axe for
>the last 3 levels,singing a mix of Warsong and Anthem and hitting about
>every 4.5 to 5 seconds. Then last nite i was given a Tenticle whip by a
>guildmate and WOW !!!!! I was hitting about every 2 sec. in fighting a
Giant
>spider I was getting 3 to 4 swings to every 1 of the spiders. I must say
>that if ye have the means(17pp) pick one up. It is a great starting weapon
>for early teen bards!
>Thanks for a great list keep up the good work all :-)
>Pinen
>Hopeless Bard of the Rathe
>Master Brewer of the NwN
>Bard of the 11th Song
